node.title: Person admitted to Wellington Hospital tests positive for Covid-19
node.description: The Capital and Coast DHB has confirmed a person tested positive for Covid-19 while at Wellington Hospital yesterday.
node.content:
["The Capital and Coast DHB has confirmed a person tested positive for Covid-19 while at Wellington Hospital yesterday.", "", "
Wellington Hospital. Photo: RNZ / Diego Opatowski
", "The person was being treated for a non-Covid related issue but was showing Covid-19 symptoms and was tested.", "The DHB said all staff that interacted with the person were wearing appropriate PPE and are fully vaccinated.", "The person is isolating on a ward set up to manage Covid-19 patients, it said.", "Investigations were continuing to determine the source of their infection."]
